      • getMinPath

        public Node getMinPath(Point startPoint,
                       Point target,
                       Field field,
                       Point snakeTail)
        calculates the shortest path from startPoint to target.
        Parameters:
        startPoint - - head position of the snake
        target - - destination point
        field - - current game field
        snakeTail - - the last position of the snake body
        Returns:
        Linked list(Node class) with target as first Node

      • calcShortWayMap

        public int[][] calcShortWayMap(Point target,
                               Field actualField)
        fills short way map with heuristic values and distance map with distance values from each point to target
        Parameters:
        target - - destination point of snake
        actualField - - the current game field
        Returns:
        short way map - map that shows walkable areas and obstacles of the current game field saved as heuristic values SPACE and WALL
